page.title: 13EDUCATION
page.content: There are seven schools in this area. These include{Shavington & Wistaston {Westfield Co.Infants,Shavington & {Wistaston Church Lane Co.Junior, {Wistaston Berkeley Co.Primary and {Shavington Co.High School.Pebble Brook {Co.Junior School}is on the edge of the area.Although English and Maths are probably the most important subjects taught others include sciences, P.E. geography,history,various languages, craft & technology and music. Increasingly common are computer studies,micro-electronics,commercial & business studies.Children who wish to gain G.C.E.'A'levels usually progress to a sixth form college after completing five years at the high school.In Sep.1985{Shavington Junior & {Infant Schools}will merge to form a new school called{Shavington Primary. {BY ANDREW,KRYSTIAN,LYNDON & DANIEL
